snippet: ELLIS--Glenn A.,died peacefully on April 11, after a long battle with brain cancer. He was a loving and devoted husband to his wife, and dearest friend, Therese. His loving daughter Kate, of Washington, DC and her wife Lauren Auerbach, also survive him. Glenn left Penguin Random House as Vice President of sales in 2014 after 43 years. He will be missed by all who knew and loved him. A memorial service will be held on Friday, April 15, 1pm at Fred H. McGrath & Son, Funeral Home, Bronxville, NY. In lieu of flowers, please consider making a donation in Glenn's name to Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center at www.giving.mskcc.org or Calvary Hospital Hospice at www.Calvaryhospital.org. 1/3
